Sentencas: The aim of the present investigation was to study the effect of doping of magnesium and calcium on the ionic conductivity of CeO2 in the system Ce1 - xCax - yMgyO2 - x (x= 0.150) for its use as a solid electrolyte in the intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT SOFC).Attempts have been made to synthesize a few compositions in this system with x = 0.150 and y = 0.000, 0.050, 0.060, 0.065 and 0.070.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of ceria co-doped with Ca and Mg

Sentencas: The precursor materials have been synthesized by auto-combustion method.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of ceria co-doped with Ca and Mg

Sentencas: Solid solution forms in compositions with y <= 0.060.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of ceria co-doped with Ca and Mg

Sentencas: Microstructures of thermally etched samples have been studied by scanning electron microscopy (SEM).
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of ceria co-doped with Ca and Mg

Sentencas: In order to evaluate the total electrical conductivity, sigma(t), use is made of complex plane impedance analysis.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of ceria co-doped with Ca and Mg

Sentencas: Impedance measurements were made in the frequency range 1 Hz-1 MHz and temperature range 250-500 degrees C.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of ceria co-doped with Ca and Mg

Sentencas: It is found that co-doped samples show higher conductivity than undoped and singly doped samples.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of ceria co-doped with Ca and Mg
